title: Traptrix Pudica

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Any player who visits you or you visit shrinks, lowering their attack value and defense value.
-A shrunk player loses all abilities and attributes the host deems that they would need to have a moderate amount of height for.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay everybody who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3278
*If you touch me, you will face hell.*
